short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: keeping track of the number of ChatGPT questions asked and showing how much time is left until the end of the three-hour period.
short.zh_CN: 跟踪所提 ChatGPT 问题的数量，并显示距离三小时结束还剩多少时间。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The effect of the plug-in to replace the placeholder information in the input box, showing the number of questions sent, click on the plug-in icon will also display the same content. It also contains every message's talk time, history chart, word cloud, exporting today chat content and generating today report. 
It's totally open source: https://github.com/14790897/GPT4-Requests-Counter

Update Diary
Latest version 2024-06-22 - Updated:

Automatic Export: The system now automatically exports the chat logs of the previous day at the start of the first chat of the current day. This ensures that users always have up-to-date records without needing to manually export them. Added a setting to enable or disable daily chat log export, giving users control over whether their chat logs are exported automatically.
2024.2.7 - Updated:

Added a button to clear remaining time : We've listened to user feedback and added a handy new feature to the latest version that allows users to clear remaining time with the click of a simple button. This makes managing time much more flexible and convenient.

Works on some websites that mimic the official UI : To improve user experience, we have extended the plugin to work not only on the official website but also on all websites that mimic the official UI. This ensures that our plugin provides a consistent experience and functionality no matter which similar website you visit.
long.zh_CN:
插件的效果为替换输入框的占位信息,显示为发送问题次数以及距离三小时还有多长时间,点击插件图标也会显示同样的内容，还包括了历史天对话次数图表，今日对话词云生成，今日对话导出，还有今日对话报告，帮助数据可视化。
完全开源：https://github.com/14790897/GPT4-Requests-Counter

更新日记
最新版本2024.2.7 - 更新内容：

增加了一个清除剩余时间的按钮 ：我们听取了用户的反馈，并在最新版本中新增了一个方便的功能，允许用户通过点击一个简单的按钮来清除剩余时间。这让管理时间变得更加灵活和方便。

对一些仿官方UI的网站生效 ：为了提高用户体验，我们扩展了插件的适用范围，使其不仅在官方网站上有效，也对所有模仿官方用户界面的网站有效。这确保了无论您访问哪个类似的网站，我们的插件都能提供一致的体验和功能。
